mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc ( title, summary, category_id, cost_score, file_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, file_md5, file_pages, views, uploader, uploader_type, create_time, state ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{summary}, #{categoryId}, #{costScore}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileMd5}, #{filePages}, #{views}, #{uploader}, #{uploaderType}, #{createTime}, #{state} )

where.if: AND (u.nickname REGEXP #{content} OR u.`name` REGEXP #{content} OR d.title REGEXP #{content})

mapper.sql: d.id, d.title, d.summary, d.category_id, d.cost_score, d.file_name, d.file_path, d.file_type, d.file_size, d.file_md5, d.file_pages, d.views, d.uploader, d.uploader_type, d.create_time, d.state
, c.id cid, c.fid, c.name cname, c.icon cicon
, c.id cid, c.fid, c.name cname, c.icon cicon, u.id uid, u.nickname uNickname, u.avatar uAvatar, COUNT(dd.user_id) AS downloads, IFNULL(u.nickname,"系统管理员")as uName

where.if: AND (d.title LIKE "%"#{content}"%" OR d.file_name LIKE "%"#{content}"%" OR u.nickname LIKE "%"#{content}"%" OR u.mobile LIKE "%"#{content}"%")

mapper.select: SELECT , u.name uName, u.nickname uNickname, u.avatar uAvatar, m.id AS m_id, m.doc_id AS m_doc_id, m.doc_page AS m_page, m.path AS m_path FROM doc d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.uploader=u.id LEFT JOIN doc_image m ON d.id=m.doc_id AND m.doc_page=1 LEFT JOIN doc_category c ON d.category_id=c.id WHERE d.state = #{state} AND d.file_type = #{fileType} OR d.file_type IN ('png', 'jpeg', 'bmp', 'gif') OR d.file_type = #{fileType}"x" ORDER BY d.${sortBy} DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT count(DISTINCT d.id) FROM doc d LEFT JOIN doc_category c ON d.category_id=c.id LEFT JOIN doc_download dd ON d.id = dd.doc_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = d.`uploader`
SELECT * FROM doc WHERE state = 1 AND file_size IS NOT NULL AND (file_name REGEXP #{keyword} OR title REGEXP #{keyword}) ORDER BY views DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc WHERE file_size IS NOT NULL AND (file_name REGEXP #{keyword} OR title REGEXP #{keyword})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc WHERE uploader_type = 2 AND uploader = #{userId} AND MONTH(create_time) = MONTH(#{month}) AND state = 1

SELECT , m.id AS m_id, m.doc_id AS m_doc_id, m.doc_page AS m_page, m.path AS m_path, dt.name AS tags FROM doc d LEFT JOIN doc_category c ON d.category_id=c.id LEFT JOIN doc_image m ON d.id = m.doc_id LEFT JOIN doc_x_tag dxt ON d.id = dxt.doc_id LEFT JOIN doc_tag dt ON dxt.tag_id=dt.id WHERE d.id = #{id}

SELECT d.id, d.title, d.summary, d.category_id categoryId, d.cost_score costScore, d.file_name fileName, d.file_path filePath, d.file_type fileType, d.file_size fileSize, d.file_md5 fileMd5, d.file_pages filePages, d.views, d.uploader, d.uploader_type uploaderType, d.create_time createTime, dc.create_time collectTime, d.state, IFNULL(u.`nickname`, '系统管理员') uploaderName FROM doc_collect dc JOIN doc d ON dc.doc_id = d.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON d.uploader = u.id AND d.uploader_type = 2 WHERE dc.user_id = #{userId} AND d.state != 9 LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT d.id, d.title, d.summary, d.category_id categoryId, d.cost_score costScore, d.file_name fileName, d.file_path filePath, d.file_type fileType, d.file_size fileSize, d.file_md5 fileMd5, d.file_pages filePages, d.views, d.uploader, d.uploader_type uploaderType, d.create_time createTime, dd.create_time downloadTime, d.state, IFNULL(u.`nickname`, '系统管理员') uploaderName FROM doc_download dd JOIN doc d ON dd.doc_id = d.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON d.uploader = u.id AND d.uploader_type = 2 WHERE dd.user_id = #{userId} AND d.state != 9 LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(d.`views`), 0) FROM doc_category c1 LEFT JOIN doc_category c2 ON c1.`id` = c2.`fid` LEFT JOIN doc d ON d.`category_id` = c2.`id` WHERE c1.`fid` IS NULL AND c1.id = #{categoryId} GROUP BY c1.`id`

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc_category c1 LEFT JOIN doc_category c2 ON c1.`id` = c2.`fid` LEFT JOIN doc d ON d.`category_id` = c2.`id` WHERE c1.`fid` IS NULL AND c1.`id` = #{categoryId} AND DATE(d.`create_time`) = DATE(#{searchTime})
